identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% Solana Token Swap dApp that blends 'Modern Minimal' with 'Web3 Professional' aesthetics.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Finance precision with Art Gallery aesthetics.
Emotion First: Trust, Speed, and Fluidity.
Content is King: The 'Swap' is the hero; everything else supports it.
Zoom In: Focus on the numbers and the token logo.
Negative Space: Luxurious padding to prevent clutter.

usage.caption: text-sm font-medium tracking-wide uppercase text-muted-foreground/60 font-mono

Input.base: bg-black/20 border-white/10 focus:border-[#1D6FFF] focus:ring-1 focus:ring-[#1D6FFF] rounded-xl h-14 text-lg px-4 transition-all placeholder:text-white/20

chart_placeholder.usage: Placeholder for chart areas if real data fails

general: Implement a 'Dark Mode First' approach. The app should feel like a premium trading terminal.
Use 'Space Grotesk' for all Headings (h1-h3) and 'Manrope' for body text. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for prices and addresses.
The 'Swap' interface is the crown jewel. Make it float using the 'glassmorphism' styles defined above.
Ensure the 'Connect Wallet' button is prominent and uses the 'primary' button style.
Use 'Recharts' for the price chart. Style it with a single neon blue line and a gradient fill below it.
For the 'Token Info' section, use a 'Bento Grid' layout to display Price, Market Cap, and Volume.
Use 'framer-motion' for smooth page transitions and entrance animations (fade-in + slide-up).

specific_pages.landing: Hero section must have the 'hero_background' image with a heavy dark gradient overlay. The CTA 'Buy Token' should be massive.
specific_pages.swap_page: Center the swap card. Add a 'slippage' settings cog icon. Show 'Estimated Received' clearly.
specific_pages.dashboard: Use a sidebar layout or top-nav. Display 'Transaction History' in a clean table with mono-spaced fonts for hashes.

accessibility: Ensure all text has a contrast ratio of at least 4.5:1 against the dark background.
Interactive elements must have a visible focus state (use ring-primary).
Add aria-labels to all icon-only buttons.

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for text unless it's a very large headline.
Avoid 'Inter' font. Use the specified font stack.
Never use default scrollbars. Style them to be thin and dark.
